results.title: Conquest
results.creator_credit: Harold L. Gray, Charles F. Banks, Reelcraft Productions and Rural Bank of New South Wales
results.brief_description: A rural bank manager and his new recruit on horseback visit a grazier who tells the story of claiming the land only to then suffer a drought causing loss to most of his stock. However his bank came to the rescue, providing him with enough money to carry on and buy new stock and equipment. A promotional film for the Rural Bank of New South Wales. Narrated by W. Lane-Bayliff
results.creator_credit_for_label: Harold L. Gray, Charles F. Banks, Reelcraft Productions and Rural Bank of New South Wales

results.title: Connemara and its ponies
results.brief_description: A visual essay on Connemara, situated on the west coast of Eire, in spring and autumn. Includes scenes of the wildlife, the ponies, and the life of the people on the farms.

results.title: Confusion: diagnosis and management
results.creator_credit: Scottish Health Education Unit and Sidhartha Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Health education and the elderly”.
One in a series about techniques for the management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. This episode looks in some detail, at the various causes of acute confusion, outlining the basic principles of treatment.

results.title: Confusion
results.creator_credit: Scottish Health Education Unit and Sidhartha Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Health education and the elderly”.
An elderly woman is found ill and confused by her neighbour. We follow the process of hospital admission through her eyes. The film stresses the importance of correct initial diagnosis and the importance of sympathetic attitudes from medical staff.

results.title: Conformity and independence (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Stanley Milgram, Harry From and Calvin Communications
results.brief_description: The topic of conformity is at the heart of any course in social psychology, and any treatment of the topic must rely heavily on the classic materials of Sherif, Asch and to a lesser extent Milgram, Kelman, Crutchfield, Moscovici, etc. The phenomena of conformity are relevant to the students’ own experience. Demonstrates laboratory work while maximising student involvement.

results.title: Conduction in P and N crystals
results.brief_description: Part two of the Semiconductor Physics series demonstrates how an extra free electron is introduced into a germanium crystal. One of the atoms having four valency electrons is replaced by a foreign atom having five valency electrons, such as an atom of antimony.
results.description: Part two of the Semiconductor Physics series demonstrates how an extra free electron is introduced into a germanium crystal. One of the atoms having four valency electrons is replaced by a foreign atom having five valency electrons, such as an atom of antimony.

results.title: Condom sense
results.creator_credit: Steve Faigenbaum, Jim Locker and Cerberus Productions
results.brief_description: A very original, informative film aimed at encouraging men to take a more active role in contraception. Using comedy to dispel the myths and complaints associated with condom use, the film presents accurate information about birth control and opens up the issues of communication and responsibility in relationships.
